full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RIGS DANG DKYIL 'KHOR KUN GYI BDAG PO KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN GSUM LDAN DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN GYI RNAM ROL PA MKHAN CHEN RIM CAN PA'I BSTAN BZHUGS GSOL 'DEBS TSANGS SRAS LHA MO'I GLU DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
